activities: Leebug is a website that facilitates networking at conferences and professional events. We store contact details of delegates on our servers so that users may contact one another within our controlled environment. In no way is it possible for users to download or export contact information from Leebug.  Leebug does not sell or distribute user’s contact information to third parties. Leebug does nothing with the personal information of the users beyond making certain data available to other users in a private, password protected area, and does so only if and to the extent authorized by the user.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU and Swiss data protection authorities
